title: Are all yasuos toxic, annoying & liars?
body:
Are all yasuos just retards spamming "Thumbs ups" and being annoying, toxic & lying about ranks? never seen a yasuo that actually doesn't spam thumbs up, isn't annoying and isn't toxic & lier,

I'm serious never seen a yasuo that isnt Spamming thumbs up, being annoying, toxic, lying.

replies.body: A Yasuo who is a decent human being is an endangered species.
Wait, there are more like me?

I spam thumbsup, mastery 7, and bm whenever I can. And as a 1,2 million mastery points Yasuo I can tell you why we are like this. Due to all the hate towards Yasuo players, we constantly get shit from everyone that doesn't play him. So whenever we do good or pull off a play, we bm or show off our "mastery 7 / thumbsup" thing. You see, we feel that we actually did something good, and that we get some kind of revenge for all the hate towards him. If someone on the enemy team calls me out for being bad for just playing a certain champion, I will even bm harder if I'm close to that person ingame. 

I'm not toxic at all though when it comes to flaming in chat etc, I just love to bm or show off mastery level 7.
Anybody who doesn't do that is usually new to Yasuo, I don't know why but apparently it comes with the champ. Just like how Rivens are stuck-up 'solo carry, my team sucks'.

> [{quoted}](name=Ghazter,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TlgwJRIA,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-05-18T23:43:25.168+0000)
>
> Anybody who doesn't do that is usually new to Yasuo, I don't know why but apparently it comes with the champ. Just like how Rivens are stuck-up 'solo carry, my team sucks'.

It could have something to with all of the ingrates constantly shitting on you over your choice of champion. Like OP for example.

Oh, and spamming thumbs-up is just psychological warfare. I want to win, and if you are too mentally weak to withstand a simple emote, you deserve to lose even more.

I don't know why you're yelling at me, I've just observed this over my time in League. I've seen the nicest people turn toxic after maining Yasuo; it's honestly scary.

I don't know about the emote, that's just a meme at this point xD I do it with a lot of champs, especially when I've just killed them at low hp or when I've killed them and lost little to no hp. I don't think that's Yasuo specific.

I think your theory does have merit. Everybody thinks that Yasuo is just a no-skill champ now because of how easily he can stomp bad players (I still think 100% bonus crit is over the top though), and so people criticize you over picking a champ like that.

I think any champ that stomps does that; Riven, Talon, Master Yi, Zed, but they all have different ambient attitudes. Maybe I'll look into that actually... Map the psychological tendencies of different people maining different champs :P

> [{quoted}](name=Ghazter,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TlgwJRIA,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2018-05-19T00:59:09.099+0000)
>
> I don't know why you're yelling at me

Did you see an exclamation point in my post?

Sorry, I got confused. At first it sounded like you thought I was a yas main or something, the way you were using 'you', but then I realized you were just responding to the OP and responded to me instead. Then I realized you were responding to me.

I have seen a few not spamming thumbs up

It is only because they have master 4 or higher though so they spam that the whole game instead.

its the nature of the champ.
mechanically he is superior to virtually every champion in the game, under this reality, he is capable of coming out on top in every situation.
The Yasuo player is aware of this.
When the Yasuo fails because of user error, it is especially tilting because he has no one to blame but himself.
I met one that was not obnoxious trash, back in S5.
No there are decent people among them
